leads.lead_text: Leaf lamina obovate or elliptic, 1–3.5 cm wide, base gradually attenuate, margins toothed
Leaf lamina obovate to broadly obovate or broadly elliptic, 1.5–5.5 cm wide, base abruptly attenuate, margins mostly entire
